Title: Gegege no Kitarou (1968)
Description: ['Kitarou, a ghost, spends his afterlife helping humans in need of his skills. He thwarts the plans of evil spirits who live to torment humanity.']
Related: ['Adaptation: GeGeGe no Kitarou', 'Alternative version: Gegege no Kitarou (2007)', 'Spin-off: Hakaba Kitarou', 'Other: Gegege no Kitarou (2018)']
